> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Added filtering based on actor flags ("Exclusions" as I called it in the icon editor) and decided that the best way to handle durations is to have a single duration set for the whole icon.

And added a warning for icons with no filters.

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Here is something to get you started on a spell reflect icon:

^1^T^SCLEUEvents^T ^SSPELL_REFLECT^B ^t^SType^Scleu ^SEnabled^B ^SSourceUnit^Splayer ^t^N48004^S`| ^Sicon^^

Putting "%s" in the binding text will display the name of the spell that was reflected.

This is probably the longest that I have ever let a ticket sit open. But it is finally complete. Going to mark it as fixed (CURSE, Y U NO MAKE IMPLEMENTED STATUS), make new tickets for any issues/additional features about it.
